thread.title: Seattle Seahawks’ Tyler Lockett wins NFC Special Teams Player of the Month honors
thread.title_full: Seattle Seahawks’ Tyler Lockett wins NFC Special Teams Player of the Month honors

author: Bob Condotta
title: Seattle Seahawks’ Tyler Lockett wins NFC Special Teams Player of the Month honors
text:
Seattle Seahawks’ Tyler Lockett wins NFC Special Teams Player of the Month honors Originally published October 1, 2015 at 8:26 am Updated October 1, 2015 at 8:28 am Seahawks wide receiver Tyler Lockett returns a kickoff in the first quarter. (Dean Rutz / The Seattle Times) 
Rookie receiver Tyler Lockett has been named the NFC’s Special Teams Player of the Month, the league announced Thursday morning. 
Lockett returned a punt for a touchdown against St. Louis and a kickoff for a touchdown against the Bears, allowing the Seahawks to rank third in the NFL in both kickoff returns (34.3) and punt returns (19.8). 
Lockett leads the NFL in total kickoff return yardage (24o) and seventh in punt return yardage (94). 
NFC Special Teams Player of Month for Sept: Seahawks KR-PR Tyler Lockett. 1st career Player of Month Award pic.twitter.com/FdT1g5H28f Most Read Stories
